discourse_list.title: The Emotional Roller-Coaster of DAO Governance with Payton and Patrick J on Drinks w/MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: A Deep Dive into DAO Governance with Patrick & Payton of GovAlpha After speaking with both @prose11 and @Patrick_J we were left with a deep appreciation of the human spirit and passion one must possess in order to endure working at a DAO. These truly remarkable contributors of MakerDAO remind us that our commitment to overcome the ups and downs of DAO Governance is what truly separates us from those who are not willing to try to change the status quo of centralize hierarchies. Creating a Decentralized Organization won’t be easy, but if they become as Amazing as the people who are here at MakerDAO, currently striving to write history… ladies and gentlemen this community will be historic!  We really enjoyed speaking with Payton and Patrick of the GovAlpha Core Unit team, as we discussed:  GovAlpha’s role in the MakerDAO Ecosystem The recent GUSD Debt Ceiling Vote The arbitrary incentives and Penalties of the Endgame How DAO Contributors should value, evaluate, and showcase their talent. Navigating the DAO landscape And so much more–perhaps even some Alpha    We hope you enjoy this episode and understand the human side of the difficulties of DA Governance  as much as we did. Thank you for watching!  Watch the Decentralized Version on MakerTube.Lens and collect this Episode as an NFT for FREE!! https://lenstube.xyz/watch/0x01a2c6-0x08  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the Drinks With MakerDAO Delegates YouTube Channel, and/or MakerTube.lens Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @prose11 a.k.a Payton Rose, @Patrick_J @ultraschuppi of Coldiron.eth,  Frank Cruz of @flipflopflapdelegate @rspa a.k.a, Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, Coldiron.eth, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube & LensTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  The Tastings: Patrick J: Ardbeg 10 Year Old Scotch Whiskey   Islay, Scotland    4.5 Stars      Payton: Colectivo Coffee, Milwaukee - Harvested in Ethiopia  3.5 Stars     Raphael: THE UNICORN Isar Bier, Brewed by hand, Bavaria  Germany   3 Stars    Schuppi: Fritz-limo apple-cherry-elderflower lemonade, Germany    3.5 Stars     Frank: Samuel Smith Winter Ale 70 years The Queen’s Platinum Jubilee USA  3.5 Stars     THE CENTRALIZED VERSION
